member.name: T:Corkscrew.SDK.ActiveDirectory.CSActiveDirectoryUser
member.summary: Represents a user account that exists in the Windows Active Directory. Such an account will not have a password set and requires the authentication to happen in the Windows OS layer. Corscrew will only perform the Authorization for such users.

member.name: M:Corkscrew.SDK.ActiveDirectory.CSActiveDirectoryUser.CreateUser(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new user in Corkscrew to match the given Active Directory user
member.exception: If the username is already in use by an existing user account
If username, password or display name are null
If the username is one of the reserved usernames

member.name: T:Corkscrew.SDK.ActiveDirectory.CSActiveDirectoryUserGroup
member.summary: Shadows an Active Directory User Group in Corkscrew. Derives from the CSUserGroup class in the SDK.Security namespace.

member.name: M:Corkscrew.SDK.ActiveDirectory.CSActiveDirectoryUserGroup.CreateUserGroup(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new user group in Corkscrew to match the Active Directory group
member.param: Username or alias of the group
member.returns: The newly created user group object
